I was finally successful in completing an interview
with Governor Gage at which time he suggested I
prepare the letter for him. The enclosed letter has
been sent to him in Salt Lake City for his signature
where he will forward it to Representative Harris.
That you may be aware of Wyoming's needs, I am
sending you unofficially a copy of the letter.
Best of success.
Sincerely,
State Superintendent
of Public Instruction
